articles.description: An AI chemist has successfully created a catalyst for producing oxygen from Martian meteorites. Immigration to and living on Mars have often been themes in science fiction. Before these dreams can become reality, humanity faces significant challenges, such as…
articles.content: Recent breakthroughs in synthesizing oxygen on Mars using a robotic AI-chemist to create OER catalysts from Martian meteorites mark a significant step towards realizing the dream of Mars colonization… [+4947 chars]
